roleset.name: take excessive profits, be a pirate

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``Let's not forget this is the same company that *trace* has been profiteering with this drug for 2 1/2 years,'' Mr. Weiss added.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'profiteer' based on wsj; nominal 'profiteering' based on BOLT-6. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: nominal rel: profiteering
example.text: Old man Mao Yushi says that the money made from usury is " the best use of money " , says that opportunistic profiteering creates wealth and is n't exploitation , his argument undoubtedly appears to be so ridiculously childish and self - deceptive !
